Posts.Content: thank you guys, i will definitly always get checked out because it is scary to think you could have cancer.
Posts.Title: does anyone have fibrocystic breasts?

Posts.Content: thanks for the reply Tryhonesty, i never noticed lumps before and i dont really feel any now so maybe mine are small and hopefully they only will come when i have my period...it is common for women to have fibrocystic breasts so im not really worried about it, i just hope the lumps are normal and not cancerous
Posts.Title: does anyone have fibrocystic breasts?

Posts.Content: hey smithn, I'm only 20 yrs old... so the lady ( she is not a certified doctor but a women who specializes in womens health..she is a gyno) I saw said that you might not see anything from a mammogram but i'm going the 25th to get checked out and I believe they will do a mammogram because the women i went to said not to wear lotion or deoderant. I have to go after my period and I think that the lumps or cysts will go down (i have never felt them before, and my breasts were swollen when i went to see the specialist). When my breasts are not swollen it will be easier to detect any lumps. I will keep you updated on my results, hopefully i will be okay I pray that I will be okay...
Posts.Title: does anyone have fibrocystic breasts?

Posts.Content: hey guys, well i went to the doctor today for the bump i felt and GOOD news, its perfectly normal!!!!! I had an ultrasound done and the bump wasnt seen that well on the screen, but she checked for quite some time and then sent the results to the doctor and she said it was normal....so im very relieved and happy right now! Thanks everyone for you help
Posts.Title: does anyone have fibrocystic breasts?

Posts.Content: I felt a hard lump in my left breast 2 days ago and i went to the doctor yesterday and she said i have Fibrocystic breasts and the lump felt normal...i have an appointment to get checked out further but i was wondering if anyone has this and is it hard to deal with. I think i only have this when i am getting or have my period because my breasts are swollen.
